original_text:
You shall know also that your offspring shall be many,
    and your descendants as the grass of the earth.
korean_text: 네 자손이 많아지며 네 후손이 땅의 풀과 같이 될 줄을 네가 알 것이라

sentences.original_text: that your offspring shall be many
and your descendants as the grass of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 후손이 땅의 풀과 같으리라는 것을
